show_name: Crayon Shin-chan: Action Kamen vs Haigure Maô (movie)
other_title: Shin-chan: Action Kamen kontra demon Haigure (Polish)
クレヨンしんちゃん アクション仮面VSハイグレ魔王 (Japanese)
蠟筆小新-動感超人VS高衩魔王 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: By finding a rare Action Kamen card, Shinnosuke Nohara and his family end up being chosen to go to a parallel world and help foil an alien invasion that is occurring over there.
